Quran Tracker Premium.name: Quran Tracker Premium
Quran Tracker Premium.description: Track Quran recitation, memorization & Tafsir in one powerful Notion template. Stay motivated, reflect deeply, and elevate your Quran journey.

90-Day Challenge Premium.name: 90-Day Challenge Premium
90-Day Challenge Premium.description: Transform your habits in 90 days with this Notion template! Track progress, stay motivated, and build better routines with ease.

Priority Compass.name: Priority Compass
Priority Compass.description: Master your time and boost your productivity with the Priority Compass, a clean and powerful Notion template inspired by the Eisenhower Matrix. This system helps you identify what truly matters and act on it effectively.

TaskMaster.name: TaskMaster
TaskMaster.description: Stay on top of your tasks with this powerful Notion template designed for seamless organization and productivity. Whether you're managing daily tasks, weekly plans, or long-term goals, TaskMaster keeps everything in one place.

Ibadat Tracker.name: Ibadat Tracker
Ibadat Tracker.description: Track your daily worship, earn badges, and stay motivated with the Ibadat Tracker Notion template. Stay consistent and elevate your spiritual journey.

Quran Tracker.name: Quran Tracker
Quran Tracker.description: Track Quran recitation, memorization & Tafsir in one powerful Notion template. Stay motivated, reflect deeply, and elevate your Quran journey.

Study Planner.name: Study Planner
Study Planner.description: Stay organized and on track with the Minimalist Study Planner! Manage courses, track progress, and meet deadlines with this clean, customizable Notion template.

Weekly Planner.name: Weekly Planner
Weekly Planner.description: Plan and prioritize your week with the Minimalist Weekly Planner! Stay organized, hit deadlines, and maximize productivity with this clean Notion template.

Habit Tracker.name: Habit Tracker
Habit Tracker.description: Track and build habits with the Minimalist Habit Tracker! Stay consistent, visualize progress, and achieve your goals with this simple, customizable Notion template.

Reading Tracker.name: Reading Tracker
Reading Tracker.description: Track your reading journey with the Minimalist Book Tracker! Stay organized, monitor progress, and capture insights in a clean, distraction-free Notion template.

90-Day Challenge.name: 90-Day Challenge
90-Day Challenge.description: Transform your habits in 90 days with this Notion template! Track progress, stay motivated, and build better routines with ease.

Quran Memorization.name: Quran Memorization
Quran Memorization.description: Master Quran memorization with the Five Fortresses method! Track progress, stay accountable, and boost retention with this structured Notion template.

Ramadan Tracker.name: Ramadan Tracker
Ramadan Tracker.description: Track your Ramadan experience with this useful Notion template. Stay motivated, stay organized, and reflect on your journey during this blessed month.

Notion Starter Pack.name: Notion Starter Pack
Notion Starter Pack.description: Get started with Notion using this handpicked collection of free, beginner-friendly templates created by Mostafa Yasser — a Notion expert and productivity creator. This Starter Pack includes essential tools to help you plan, track, and stay productive in your daily life.

Idea Flow - Team Edition.name: Idea Flow - Team Edition
Idea Flow - Team Edition.description: Elevate your team’s productivity with Idea Flow – Team Edition, a powerful Notion template designed to streamline collaborative idea management. This all-in-one system transforms raw concepts into successful outcomes by fostering discussion, enabling informed decisions, and ensuring seamless execution. Built for clarity and collaboration, it empowers teams to stay aligned and focused.

StudyHub.name: StudyHub
StudyHub.heroHead: Master your student life with StudyHub
StudyHub.description: the all-in-one Notion template for tracking everything from classes and tasks to habits and goals.

Idea Flow - Solo Edition.name: Idea Flow - Solo Edition
Idea Flow - Solo Edition.description: Transform your ideas into actionable outcomes with Idea Flow – Solo Edition, the ultimate all-in-one system for managing and organizing your personal ideas. Designed for simplicity and clarity, this Notion template ensures no idea gets lost by guiding you through structured stages—from raw thoughts to completed projects.

Notion Me.name: Notion ME
Notion Me.description: Create a professional personal homepage using Notion. Notion Me is a clean, elegant template designed for creators, freelancers, and professionals who want to showcase their identity, services, and latest work — all in one place.
